title: What are the best movies of Bollywood? - Quora

response.answer_text: DO SCROLL & YOU WILL FIND WHAT YOU’RE SEARCHING MAYBE BELOW(LASTLY) Do comment if I left any major missing, will update the answer as soon as possible. NOTE:- The following films are not in order. All the movies are important but the order is not there kindly watch all as soon as you get time as all are awesome and must watch movies. ————————————————————————————————————— They are:- 1.)LAGAAN:- Reminds us about our history i.e. The British Rule and tells a lot about the mentality and socio-economic condition of India during Colonial Rule. The Indian learnt cricket that was played only by the elite Britishers that time and played against the Britishers. A must watch movie with family and the dialogues and songs are tremendous. If anybody didn’t watched Lagaan he didn’t watch anything of Bollywood.      2.) TAARE ZAMEEN PAR:- One other than Amir Khan’s Taare Zameen Par is the among-st the best movie in the Bollywood. This movie is a full package of laugh, love, cry etc. It will definitely make you laugh and cry too for sure. Amir was the best teacher I can ever imagine and puts his full efforts every child to bring the childhood which each of them are push in it just because of academic pressure or other. A song in this movie was hit and brings tears till now in the eyes i.e. ‘Maa’  Literally a must watch and definitely you like it.        3.) ROCKSTAR :- My personal favourite movie. The songs are also awesome. Such watch this movie this is a must spectacular one. Some said the movie was ahead of its time but it well deserved on the list. Everything in this movie is just awesome. From a boy ‘Janardhan’ who knows nothing and use to play guitar on the bus stand to Become ROCKSTAR ‘JORDAN’. Must watch the movie.     4.) BAAHUBALI 1 & 2 :- The Best Movie of India. Nothing to say. Just watch it. For best experience first watch Baahubali 1 and then wait for few days and then watch Baahubali 2. The cinematography, music, scenes, action, romance, dialogues, story, thriller, comedy all are perfect and a must watch that’s all.            5.)CHAK DE INDIA :- Among-st the best movie I must say. Gives the patriotism feeling and awesome to watch everytime. Shahrukh has proven in this movie that why he is king khan of bollywood.    6.) RANG DE BASANTI :- Amongst the best movies of all time. Literally brings tears in the eyes of the audience more than once. The climax is awesome and can’t forget the movie ever. Amir & other actors had done the great acting. You’ll literally love the story and the film definitely.    7.) 3 IDIOTS:- India is the home of Engineers. If your father want you to become an engineer must watch it once. Really the best movie of Bollywood.Can ask anyone.     8.) OH MY GOD:- You must watch it either you are atheist or religious. Paresh Rawal had done fantastic acting in the movie surely you’ll like it and will definitely enjoy the movie.   9.) UDAAN :- I think it is the best movie for every youngster and parent should watch. Udaan is a cult-classic movie and should definitely be watched. You’ll going to enjoy each and every second of the movie and will know how a teenager thinks.     10.) ZINDAGE NA MILEGI DOBARA:- Must watch with your friends and then plan a new adventurous trip then and there since Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara.    —————————————————————————————————————- EDIT 1 :- Thanks for 300 Upvotes it means alot to me. I have added few more movies which I think is relevant with the answer. Do tell me about opinions in the comment section below. I would love to answer. And kindly upvote if you agree. ————————————————————————————————————— 11.) SWADES :- One the best of Shahrukh Khan which no one can regret watching to it. Literally among-st the best movies I watched till now. It tells about the importance of education in once life which can change the life of many.       12.) NEWTON:- One should definitely watch this movie once in their lifetime. The movie is fantastic piece of work and you’ll definitely come to know about many things of the society.       13.) LUNCHBOX :- A beautiful art-film of Irrfan Khan and Nimrat Kaur. It is beautiful story and a must watch. It will leave with a thought and the ending totally depends upon you. It will also leaves you will laughter and hunger too after seeing the food many times I was feeling too much hungry. Do watch it with family it is a best family movie also i suppose. Nawazuddin and Irrfan both have done tremendous acting in the movie. Definitely a must watch.     14.) AIRLIFT :- When Iran invaded Kuwait there was an Indian man who was earning millions there who could easily come back to India with his family but NO. He was concerned about other Indians who was trapped there and have no means to come. Just watch what he does for them and how all 1,70,000 Refugees came back to our country i.e. INDIA. Definitely a must watch movie and surely you’ll not regret watching it later. Do watch it. Among-st the best movie in the Bollywood.       15.) NEERJA :- The true story of an Indian Airhostress who saved many life but lost her for everyone in the plane hijack. Do watch and comment how you felt after watching the film. Fabulous I must say.        16.)BAJRANGI BHAIJAAN:- Literally it should be up in the list but I forget to mention it earlier, don’t know why but it was the movie where in the end everybody, I mean the whole multiplex was in tears and clapped. It was definitely a must watch. Everything from music to scenes to dialogue all are perfect and you’ll love Salman Khan more after watching it. Just watch it.       17.) DIL CHAHTA HAI :- Best movie to watch with friends. Awesome movie. Just watch it. Aamir Khan, Akshayee Khanna & Saif Ali Khan all have done the best work. Watch it.        18.) DRISHYAM :- The best suspense movie so far. It will definitely make your jaw drop. The climax is just unexpected like never in any film. It should be above in the list but NO the best parts are down in the context. If you’ve not watched it till now just do watch it today only. Best suspense thriller movie of Bollywood.     19.) NIL BATTAYE SANNATA :- Education is important in the life of everyone. It doesn’t matter whether a person is coming from an elite family or a poor one. This movie is awesome how a maid goes to school just because her daughter should study. Definitely watch this movie and I would really like to say Swara Bhaskar has done awesome work in the film. Do watch it for sure.     20.) LAKSHYA:- When you’ve no motive in life just watch this movie. It is an awesome piece of work by Hrithik Roshan and the title track till now motivates and gives the patriotism feeling within.        EDIT 2:- Thanks for all the comments which you all gave for the betterment of the answer it was precious and important for me. There are more movies which the people commented should be added to the list to make it even better and they are as follows.  21.) MASAAN :- It is an adult movie which you shouldn’t watch with your family but it is a must watch one. Really this list will remain incomplete without adding MASAAN to it and this point will remain incomplete without mentioning the beautiful song in the movie which keeps on going in the mind and it is :-’Tu Kisi Rail Si Guzarti Hai’ by Swanand Kirkire. The movie is emotional & romantic at the same time. Must watch I must say and you will thank me later.        22.) GULAAL :- The movie was totally amazing and engineering people should watch it and then they come to know what actual ragging is! This is what was happening in India before and this ragging now also happens in foreign countries too. After all the movie is a real patronist one if you’re Indian and then if you’re Rajput then this movie is for you. Kay Kay Menon has done fabulous acting like always and will definitely give goosebumps many times. Do watch it.     23.) ALIGARH :- In India being gay is not natural and that person should suffer in his whole life time this what Indian society wants unlike America where gay also gets respect and freedom just like others. Do watch this movie once it will tell you about the harsh reality of Indian society. No need to say Rajkumar Rao & Manoj Kumar both have done brilliant work in the film. Also this is the true story of ‘Shrinivas Ramchandra Siras.’ It will give to tears definitely and you’ll going to think about the problem in our society after watching this awesome movie.      24.) SHAHID :- How a man alone can fight for freedom this movie tells us. And what the society does to it that also. ‘Every Muslim is not a terrorist and Every Terrorist is not a Muslim’ this we must understand and this is what Rajkumar Rao does in this movie. Awesome movie no doubt but it will also give you tears and happiness both.      25.) RAAZI :- This is a true amazing story on the book :-’Calling Sehmat’ Alia Bhatt has done best of her acting and definately gives tears to us and takes us to all the tendor conditions in the movie which we should experience to feel the film like we feel the novel. Songs are also amazing and the best one was:- ‘Dilbaro’ i guess.        26.) OMERTA:- Again a great movie by Rajkumar Rao. It tells a lot about the mentally of a terrorist and in that movie he acts as ‘Ahmed Omar Saeed Sheikh’ which was among-st the most wanted and most notorious , sharp and smart terrorist. Definitely watch this movie as it will give you goosebumps and also tells you more about the society like who is who. Must watch it.         27.) PADMAAVAT:- The movie which created the most controversies and got Supreme Court’s Order to release. Do watch it as it was banned from few states from releasing and must watch that what was it that created so much controversy. Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Shahid Kapoor all have done brilliant performance and the movie is also amazing. A great work of Sanjay Leela Bhansali.        28.) SHIP OF THESEUS :- I have heard alot about it but I have not watched it till now. Do watch it definitely as many have recommended it as the best movie of Bollywood so far. And do tell about the movie and it’s review in the comment section below. Should I watch it or not? Do tell and why should I watch it that also!         29.) GANGS OF WASSEYPUR:- No need to tell about the legendary of this movie. Both part 1 and part 2 both are tremendously awesome. I think I don’t need to tell you that you shouldn’t watch this movie with your parents. But I definitely tell to watch this movie again with your friends if possible.          30)KABIR SINGH:- This movie is debatable some liked it some don’t. Some say it truely reveals about the true love of a person, some say that it’s just self-destruction with vulgarity and male muscularity. Do decide yourself, I did liked the movie and hope you too.            EDIT 3:- Thanks for so many comments which suggest the movies I missed & also corrected me in my choice some do got offended too with my list but that’s different case. Got some more suggestions:- 31) I Am Kalam- Legendary movie on legendary man. The former President of India. The story about the legendary scientist who over-come all the obstructions in his life & did many great work for the country. The Missile man of India Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam.       32) My Name is Khan- one of the best work of sharukh khan. The movie has its serious essense by questioning the concept of hindu and muslim.The innocense and calm of the character in such a difficult situation i.e., fighting without violence. the emotions are expressed in an ideal though difficult to beleive. its dark scence are well compensated by beautiful love story that would definitely helped to change the temperament. He suffers from dyslexia & suffers bullying of muslim in US. Finally telling the Presudent of US his ultimate aim- “Sir, My name is Khan, and I am not a terrorist.”       33) Mulk- One of the great movie to watch by late actor Rishi Kapoor & Taapsee Pannu. Tells alot about the suffering of muslims in India.    34) A Wednesday- If one loves thriller it us a must watch giving some of the best dialogues ever. One of the under-rated movie of bollywood. Naseerudin Shah & Anupan Kher both did tremendous job.      35) Badla- Since thriller is one of the main genre, if one loved Drishyam then Badla is a must watch. Kindly please don’t spoil this beautiful movie & do watch the climax by yourself knowing the whole story. Kindly don’t miss the beginning.      36) Devdas- Shahrukh Kha is an actor who can do justice to every character, just a big budget movie etc can be many reasons for denial but no doubt acting of Shahrukh showed his hardwork, his drunkness made people cry the side effects are just not said but showed whereas Ashwariya Rai smile is work watching even her patience & beleve that Deva i.e. Devdas will come-back to her. Not to tell but Maduri’s dance & dialgues were also incompariable. Strong emotion and great or rather dramatic scenes does not let story behind. Some dialogues of the movie created history.          These were some of the best from my side do suggest in the comment box for even better list. Lastly I would like to thank all the 1K Upvoters so far who liked my answer. Literally it means alot. And 1Lakh 13K views. Really Thankyou. People say in their post not to do comment but I really want you people to comment any mistake or any major missing in my answer so that I can improve my content for good readability. Do comment for the betterment. Lastly thanks alot again. -Apoorv Upadhyay

Below are few of some very good bollywood movies Swades (2004) - A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.Rang De Basanti (2006) - This story is about six friends who help an English filmmaker create a documentary about Indian freedom struggle. During filming, this group of friends learn about those before them and the importance of fighting for their rights.A Wednesday (2008) - A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India (2001) - The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.Gangs of Wasseypur duology (2012) - A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.Hera Pheri (2000) - Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they recieve a call from a kidnapper. However, things do not go as planned.PK (2014) - A stranger in the city asks questions no one has asked before. His childlike curiosity will take him on a journey of love, laughter, and letting go.Highway (2014) - Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.Table No. 21 (2013) - A couple live a mediocre life and are thrilled to have won an exotic vacation to Fiji & their excitement increases when they get a chance to play "Tell all truth" game for a mind boggling prize money. The game begins and the couple discovers that the game isn't really a game, but is a game of survival.Andaz Apna Apna (1994) - Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress, inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.Pink (2016) - When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.Dil Chahta Hai (2001) - Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara (2011) - Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their number becomes engaged.Masaan (2015) - Two stories- one involving a father-daughter tormented by the orthodox architecture of a small-town, another following the musings of a young couple from different castes, meander along the shores of the Ganges, as the river of life touches them in different ways, destined to coalesce at the Sangam Allahabad.Bombay (1995) - A Hindu man and a Muslim woman fall in love in a small village and move to Mumbai, where they have two children. However, growing religious tensions and erupting riots threaten to tear the family apart.Hey ram (2000) - Saketh Ram's wife is raped and killed during direct action day riots in Calcutta. He is convinced that Mahatma Gandhi is responsible for all the problems happening in the country and sets out to kill him.CityLights (2014) - Deepak Sing is a farmer in Rajasthan. After a tragedy, he migrates to Mumbai with his wife and child to lead a better life. However, upon arriving, he soon discovers the challenges of life in a big city.Aamir (2008) - A doctor of Indian origin returning to Mumbai from London is forced to participate in a terrorist plot.Life in a Metro (2007) - Six different stories, about nine people, each with different issues and problems, all occurring within one place: the METRO.Mumbai Meri Jaan (2008) - Five people whose lives are affected by the 2006 Mumbai train bombings.Manorama Six Feet Under (2007) - Jobless Satyaveer accepts money from Manorama, wife of the Irrigation Minister, to collect evidence against her husband's extra-marital affair. He accepts, unaware that he too is being deceived.Johnny Gaddaar (2007) - Police officers recount a tale of missing money which results in lies, deceit, betrayal and death.Ab Tak Chhappan (2004) - Sadhu, an encounter specialist, is armed with a personal vendetta to find and kill the gangsters responsible for his wife's death.Udaan (2010) - Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.Khosla Ka Ghosla! (2006) - A Delhi based retired middle class man tries half-heartedly to get his land back from a swindling property dealer with the help of his sons and their friends.Lakshmi (2014) - Based on true events, Lakshmi is a story of heroism and untold courage. Lakshmi, a 13 year old girl is kidnapped and sold into prostitution. Thrown into this horrific, inhuman world where she is raped and brutally beaten she barely survives with the help of the other girls and her own will to never give in.Ugly (2013) - The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.Stanley Ka Dabba (2011) - A school-teacher, who forces children to share their food with him, forbids one from entering the school until he brings his own Tiffin/Lunch-box.Dhanak (2015) - Believing actor and goodwill ambassador Shah Rukh Khan can help her brother get an operation to restore his sight, a 10-year old girl takes her blind 8-year old brother on a trek across Rajasthan in search of the superstar.Parched (2015) - In the arid landscape of Rajashthan, four women navigate their way through personal and cultural difficulties.Nil Battey Sannata (2015) - A story about a single women (a Mom) and dreams on her Daughter.
